import React from 'react' import { makeStyles, createStyles, Theme } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { Grid, Paper } from '@material-ui/core/' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme: Theme)=> createStyles({ container: { backgroundColor: "rgb(33, 117, 46)", height: "25vh", color: "rgb(135, 237, 144)", textAlign: "center" }, header: { margin: 0, padding: 20 }, column: { width: "33%" } })) export const Topics = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
